Perform an action from a keybinding.

parameterdescription.para: The key to trigger the action.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the action was performed successfully, FALSE otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Discover if a key is bound.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the the key has an action associated with it.

detaileddescription.para: Register a key-binding to an existing action.

parameterdescription.para: The class the binding is for.
A new trigger for the binding, followed by a NULL-terminated list of parameters for the callback.

memberdef.argsstring: (GntBindableClass *klass, const char *name, GntBindableActionCallback callback, const char *trigger,...)
memberdef.name: gnt_bindable_class_register_action

detaileddescription.para: Register a bindable action for a class.

parameterdescription.para: The class the binding is for.
The default trigger for the binding, orNULL, followed by a NULL-terminated list of default parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Returns a GntTree populated with "key" -> "binding" for the widget.

parameterdescription.para: The object to list the bindings for.

detaileddescription.para: Builds a window that list the key bindings for a GntBindable object. From this window a user can select a listing to rebind a new key for the given action.

parameterdescription.para: The object to list the bindings for.
